resource.chars:
being <s>[text?]<\s> simply an instance of that 
“imitative repetition” of parts so common 
among the lower animals 
It seems startling to assert that 
a salpa of the form A with some fifty or sixty 
of the form B which proceed from it -
constitutes but one zoological individual 
still more to aver this of some millions 
of Aphides all proceeding indirectly from 
one ovum - but then difficulties have 
reference merely to our ordinary notion of 
individuality - and involve us in no 
self contradictions <s>[text?]<\s> and inconsistencies 
such as seem inherent in any other 
view of the case -
